## ResolveRefValueArrayTraits type

Converts the resolved RefType Value type into Array<!-- -->&lt;<!-- -->&gt; according to the `array` and `arrayRequired` properties of the RefType

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ResolveRefValueArrayTraits<Ref extends RefTypeParamShape, Value> = Ref['array'] extends false ? Value : Ref['arrayRequired'] extends true ? Array<Value> : Array<Value> | null | undefined;
```
**References:** [RefTypeParamShape](./data-schema.reftypeparamshape.md)
